title: The Liberated letter
creator_credit: John Mills, American Library Association, Formula One Films and Letraset International
brief_description: Presents a brief history of the development of lettering, the invention of the printing press and the more recent invention of phototypesetting. Shows the production of Letraset instant lettering and some of the styles available.
creator_credit_for_label: John Mills, American Library Association, Formula One Films and Letraset International
